title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: UPDATE: Alaska Airlines resumes flights, but Friday flight cancellations mount
items.description: Alaska Airlines issued a seven-hour ground stop Thursday evening due to an information technology problem that plagued its systems. More cancellations...

items.title: The 8 best ways to redeem up to 100,000 American Airlines AAdvantage miles
items.description: Maximize 100,000 American Airlines AAdvantage miles with these redemptions, from first-class flights to smart economy bookings.

items.title: Are you eligible for the Citi Strata Elite's 100,000-point welcome bonus?
items.description: Citi has introduced the all-new Citi Strata Elite Card with a high-value welcome offer to go with it. Who is eligible for the bonus? Find out the rest...

items.title: Air Canada takes aim at rival with US flights from Toronto's downtown airport
items.description: Air Canada will connect Toronto's convenient Billy Bishop Toronto City Airport (YTZ) with Boston, Chicago, New York and Washington, D.C., next spring.

items.title: TPG analysis of JetBlue and United award pricing in the new Blue Sky alliance
items.description: United and JetBlue just launched a new Blue Sky alliance. Here's a special TPG analysis of the United and JetBlue awards you can book through this all...
